mapper.sql:
select t.*, case when days = 0 and hours = 0 and minutes = 0 then CONCAT(seconds , '秒') when days = 0 and hours = 0 then CONCAT(minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') when days = 0 then CONCAT(hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') ELSE CONCAT(days, '天', hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') end as keeptimeShow from ( SELECT (floor(KeepTime / 86400)) as days, (floor(KeepTime / 3600) % 24) as hours, (floor(KeepTime / 60) % 60) as minutes, (KeepTime % 60) as seconds, a.AlarmReportID, a.VehId, a.BeginTime, a.EndTime, a.MaxSpeed, a.AlarmType, a.Longitude, a.Latitude, a.Velocity, a.Angle, a.`Local`, a.Elevation, a.Limited, a.Passed, a.Time, a.KeepTime, a.Road_Name, a.Road_Level, a.Road_Limited, a.DisposeAlarmName, a.DisposeAlarmTime, a.alarmcl, a.alarmclmsg, a.alarmhdremark, a.PushState, a.verifyName, a.verifyTime, a.AnalyzeMode, a.SysPassed, ifnull( a.`status`,0) as status, case when ifnull(status,0) = 1 then '一级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 2 then '二级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 3 then '三级报警' end as statusShow, a.SynTime, a.plateNumber, a.plateNumber as plate, a.color, dept.dept_name as company, a.OperatType, a.EndSpeed, ROUND(ifnull(a.Distance,0)/1000,3) as Distance, a.Road_Limited2, a.IsSupplements, a.CutoffTime, a.verifyTime2, a.AlarmID, a.endLongitude, a.endLatitude, a.endRoadName, a.isRegionV, case when ifnull(isRegionV,0) = 1 then '(区域已验证)' else '' end isRegionVShow, a.AnalyzeID, a.atNocturnal, case when a.atNocturnal=1 then '夜间' else '' end atNocturnalShow, a.BaoJingType, a.ChaoSuBi, CONCAT(a.ChaoSuBi,'%') as ChaoSuBiShow, a.calctime, a.status as alarmlevel, a.alarmGuid, a.icardsign, b.chulizhuangtai, b.chulixingshi, b.chulimiaoshu, b.chulirenid, b.chuliren, b.chulishijian, b.fujian, b.beizhu, b.remark, b.shensushenhebiaoshi, b.shensushenheren, b.shensushenheshijian, b.shensushenheyijian, b.twicechulixingshi, b.twicechulimiaoshu, b.twicefujian, b.twicechuliren, b.twicechulishijian, b.twicechulirenid, b.endresult, b.baojingleixing, v.accessoryphone AS accessoryphone, IFNULL(convert((a.Distance/1000)/(a.KeepTime/3600),decimal(10,2)),0) as pingjunsudu, case when ROUND((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CutoffTime))/86400) > 8 then '超期' else '未超期' end as chaoqi FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime AS a left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.dept_id,accessoryphone FROM anbiao_vehicle a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT accessoryphone,VehId FROM anbiao_vehicle_phone WHERE is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1) b on a.id = b.vehid where a.dept_id = #{deptId}) v ON a.VehId = v.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' AND shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on v.dept_id = dept.id where 1=1
and cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00') and cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1
and AlarmType in ('无数据报警','不定位报警')
and AlarmType = #{alarmType}
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=1
and ( IFNULL(chulizhuangtai,'') = '' or IFNULL(shensushenhebiaoshi,0) = 2 ) and IFNULL(twicechuliren,'') = ''
and chulizhuangtai = '2' and remark=1
and ( IFNULL(chulizhuangtai,'') = '' or IFNULL(shensushenhebiaoshi,0) = 2 ) and IFNULL(twicechuliren,'') = '' and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 7
and ( IFNULL(chulizhuangtai,'') = '' or IFNULL(shensushenhebiaoshi,0) = 2 ) and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 5 and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) < 8
and ( IFNULL(chulizhuangtai,'') = '' or remark != 0 )
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 0
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 1
and chulizhuangtai = '1' and remark=0 and shensushenhebiaoshi= 2
and plateNumber like concat('%', #{cheliangpaizhao} ,'%')
AND ChaoSuBi >= ${chaosubi}
AND ChaoSuBi <= ${chaosubiMax}
and status = 1
) as t where 1=1

sql.if: and status=#{status} or status is null

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0

mapper.select:
select max(a.company) company, COUNT(DISTINCT a.plateNumber,a.color) as vehCount, COUNT(a.alarmreportid) as alarmCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.chulizhuangtai is not null THEN 1 END) as handledCount from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime as a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' AND shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on v.dept_id = dept.id
left join baobiao_alarmhandleresult as b on a.alarmreportid = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 and b.chulizhuangtai > 0 where 1=1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00') and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and a.passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1
and a.AlarmType in ('无数据报警','不定位报警')
and a.AlarmType = #{alarmType}
and a.company like CONCAT(#{jigouName},'%')
and a.company = #{deptName}
and a.status = 1
-- group by a.company

select COUNT(case when alarmType='超速报警' then 1 else null end) as chaosu, COUNT(case when alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' then 1 else null end) as pilao, COUNT(case when alarmType='夜间行驶报警' then 1 else null end) as yejian, COUNT(case when alarmType='停驶违规报警' then 1 else null end) as tingshi, COUNT(case when alarmType='无数据报警' or alarmType='不定位报警' then 1 else null end) as yichang from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on v.dept_id = dept.id where 1 = 1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00')
and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and a.AnalyzeMode = 1 and a.passed = 100

select t.* from ( SELECT b.chulizhuangtai, b.chulixingshi, b.chulimiaoshu, b.chulirenid, b.chuliren, b.chulishijian, b.fujian, b.beizhu, b.shensushenhebiaoshi, b.shensushenheren, b.shensushenheshijian, b.shensushenheyijian, b.remark, b.twicechulixingshi, b.twicechulimiaoshu, b.twicefujian, b.twicechuliren, b.twicechulishijian, b.twicechulirenid, b.endresult FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime AS a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where b.baojingid = #{id} and b.baojingleixing = #{baojingleixing} ) as t where 1=1 limit 1

select t.* from ( SELECT a.AlarmType, a.BeginTime, a.EndTime, a.AlarmGuid, a.verifyTime, a.verifyName, b.chulizhuangtai, b.chulixingshi, b.chulimiaoshu, b.chulirenid, b.chuliren, b.chulishijian, b.fujian, b.beizhu, b.shensushenhebiaoshi, b.shensushenheren, b.shensushenheshijian, b.shensushenheyijian, b.remark, b.twicechulixingshi, b.twicechulimiaoshu, b.twicefujian, b.twicechuliren, b.twicechulishijian, b.twicechulirenid, b.endresult FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime AS a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where a.AlarmReportID = #{id} and a.AlarmType = #{AlarmType} ) as t where 1=1 limit 1

select t.*, case when days = 0 and hours = 0 and minutes = 0 then CONCAT(seconds , '秒') when days = 0 and hours = 0 then CONCAT(minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') when days = 0 then CONCAT(hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') ELSE CONCAT(days, '天', hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') end as keeptimeShow from ( SELECT (floor(KeepTime / 86400)) as days, (floor(KeepTime / 3600) % 24) as hours, (floor(KeepTime / 60) % 60) as minutes, (KeepTime % 60) as seconds, a.AlarmReportID, a.VehId, a.BeginTime, a.EndTime, a.MaxSpeed, a.AlarmType, a.Longitude, a.Latitude, a.Velocity, a.Angle, a.`Local`, a.Elevation, a.Limited, a.Passed, a.Time, a.KeepTime, a.Road_Name, a.Road_Level, a.Road_Limited, a.DisposeAlarmName, a.DisposeAlarmTime, a.alarmcl, a.alarmclmsg, a.alarmhdremark, a.PushState, a.verifyName, a.verifyTime, a.AnalyzeMode, a.SysPassed, ifnull( a.`status`,0) as status, case when ifnull(status,0) = 1 then '一级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 2 then '二级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 3 then '三级报警' end as statusShow, a.SynTime, a.plateNumber, a.plateNumber as plate, a.color, a.company, a.OperatType, a.EndSpeed, ROUND(ifnull(a.Distance,0)/1000,3) as Distance, a.Road_Limited2, a.IsSupplements, a.CutoffTime, a.verifyTime2, a.AlarmID, a.endLongitude, a.endLatitude, a.endRoadName, a.isRegionV, case when ifnull(isRegionV,0) = 1 then '(区域已验证)' else '' end isRegionVShow, a.AnalyzeID, a.atNocturnal, case when a.atNocturnal=1 then '夜间' else '' end atNocturnalShow, a.BaoJingType, a.ChaoSuBi, CONCAT(a.ChaoSuBi,'%') as ChaoSuBiShow, a.calctime, a.status as alarmlevel, a.alarmGuid, a.icardsign, b.chulizhuangtai, b.chulixingshi, b.chulimiaoshu, b.chulirenid, b.chuliren, b.chulishijian, b.fujian, b.beizhu, b.remark, b.shensushenhebiaoshi, b.shensushenheren, b.shensushenheshijian, b.shensushenheyijian, IFNULL(convert((a.Distance/1000)/(a.KeepTime/3600),decimal(10,2)),0) as pingjunsudu FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime AS a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where 1=1 and left(CutoffTime,10) = left(NOW(),10)
and v.dept_id = (select id from blade_dept where dept_name = #{company} and is_deleted = 0)
and AlarmType in ('无数据报警','不定位报警')
and AlarmType = #{AlarmType}
and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 ) as t where 1=1 ORDER BY t.BeginTime DESC

select DISTINCT AlarmType from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id
INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.id, xiaji.parent_id, xiaji.dept_name, xiaji.is_deleted FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId} ) dept on v.dept_id = dept.id
where 1 = 1
and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( '${beginTime}', ' 00:00:00')
and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( '${endTime}', ' 23:59:59')
and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1
and a.company like CONCAT(#{jigouName},'%')
and v.dept_id = (select id from blade_dept where dept_name = #{deptName} and is_deleted = 0)

SELECT DISTINCT xiaji.dept_name FROM blade_dept shangji, blade_dept xiaji WHERE xiaji.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(shangji.tree_code,'%') AND xiaji.is_deleted = 0 AND xiaji.extend_type='机构' and shangji.id=#{deptId}

select t.*, case when days = 0 and hours = 0 and minutes = 0 then CONCAT(seconds , '秒') when days = 0 and hours = 0 then CONCAT(minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') when days = 0 then CONCAT(hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') ELSE CONCAT(days, '天', hours ,'时' , minutes , '分' , seconds , '秒') end as keeptimeShow from ( SELECT AlarmReportID, VehId, BeginTime, EndTime, MaxSpeed, AlarmType, Longitude, Latitude, Velocity, Angle, Local, Elevation, Limited, Passed, Time, KeepTime, (floor(KeepTime / 86400)) as days, (floor(KeepTime / 3600) % 24) as hours, (floor(KeepTime / 60) % 60) as minutes, (KeepTime % 60) as seconds, Road_Name, Road_Level, Road_Limited, DisposeAlarmName, DisposeAlarmTime, alarmcl, alarmclmsg, alarmhdremark, PushState, verifyName, verifyTime, AnalyzeMode, SysPassed, case when ifnull(status,0) = 1 then '一级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 2 then '二级报警' when ifnull(status,0) = 3 then '三级报警' end as statusShow, SynTime, plateNumber, color, company, OperatType, EndSpeed, Distance, Road_Limited2, IsSupplements, CutoffTime, verifyTime2, AlarmID, endLongitude, endLatitude, endRoadName, isRegionV, AnalyzeID, atNocturnal, BaoJingType, ChaoSuBi FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime WHERE CutoffTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( concat(#{beginTime}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 AND company = #{company} AND plateNumber=#{plateNumber} ANd color=#{color} )t ORDER BY t.BeginTime
SELECT shiyongxingzhi FROM anbiao_vehicle WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND cheliangpaizhao NOT LIKE '%挂' GROUP BY shiyongxingzhi

select a.id as deptId, a.dept_name as company, a.baojingcishu, a.baojingclcishu, case when IFNULL(baojingclcishu,0) = 0 or IFNULL(baojingcishu,0) = 0 then '0.00%' when ROUND((baojingclcishu*1.0/baojingcishu)*100,2) = 100 then '100%' else concat(ROUND((baojingclcishu*1.0/baojingcishu)*100,2),'%') end as chulilv from( select a.id, a.dept_name, ifnull(chaosu,0)+ifnull(pilao,0)+ifnull(yejian,0)+ifnull(wushuju,0)+ifnull(budingwei,0) +ifnull(pilaoshipin,0)+ifnull(chouyan,0)+ifnull(dadianhua,0)+ifnull(fenshen,0) as 'baojingcishu', ifnull(chaosucl,0)+ifnull(pilaocl,0)+ifnull(yejiancl,0)+ifnull(wushujucl,0)+ifnull(budingweicl,0) +ifnull(pilaoshipincl,0)+ifnull(chouyancl,0)+ifnull(dadianhuacl,0)+ifnull(fenshencl,0) as 'baojingclcishu' from blade_dept a left join( select a.company, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' then 1 else null end) as chaosu, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' then 1 else null end) as pilao, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='夜间行驶报警' then 1 else null end) as yejian, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='停驶违规报警' then 1 else null end) as tingshi, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='无数据报警' then 1 else null end) as wushuju, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='不定位报警' then 1 else null end) as budingwei, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 1 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu1, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 2 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu2, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 3 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu3, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' and `status` > 0 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongpilao, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as chaosucl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as pilaocl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='夜间行驶报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as yejiancl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='停驶违规报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as tingshicl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='无数据报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as wushujucl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='不定位报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as budingweicl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 1 and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu1cl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 2 and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu2cl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='超速报警' and `status` = 3 and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongchaosu3cl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='疲劳驾驶报警' and `status` > 0 and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as yanzhongpilaocl from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a left join (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) v on a.VehId = v.id left JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult AS b ON a.AlarmReportID = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0)=0 where 1 = 1 and Passed = 100 and a.AnalyzeMode = 1 and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59') and a.company = #{deptName} group by a.company )t1 on a.dept_name = t1.company left join ( select a.company, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='分神驾驶报警' then 1 else null end) as fenshen, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='生理疲劳报警' then 1 else null end) as pilaoshipin, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='抽烟报警' then 1 else null end) as chouyan, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='接打电话报警' then 1 else null end) as dadianhua, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='分神驾驶报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as fenshencl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='生理疲劳报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as pilaoshipincl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='抽烟报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as chouyancl, COUNT(case when a.alarmType='接打电话报警' and b.id is not null and b.chulizhuangtai=1 then 1 else null end) as dadianhuacl from baobiao_driverbehavior a LEFT JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult b on a.id = b.baojingid and a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0)=0 where 1 = 1 and a.StateEx = '核定报警' and a.GpsTime >= CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and a.GpsTime <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59') and a.company = #{deptName} group by a.company )t2 on a.dept_name = t2.company where a.extend_type = '机构' and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.dept_name = #{deptName} )a

select.if: select * from baobiao_alarmsummary_record where AlarmReportID = #{AlarmReportID} and level = 99 order by begintime limit 1

mapper.select: select time, message, messageType, lastSpeed, sendType from tts_message where 1=1 and AlarmGuid = #{alarmGuId} and messageType = "报警短信" order by time desc limit 1

if.test: orderColumn != null and orderColumn != '' and order != 0
